channel.title: Whats going on?
channel.description: hey everyone, kk ive got the source and a client, everything works fine when i log in with the ip 127.0.0.1 but i want to be able to log in with the ip that i made in the no-ip thing which is crisispkz.no-ip.org. ive made that ip and everything, thats all good. ive done the portforwarding, and ive allowed the port thing through my firewall and everything. but i still cant log on with the ip that ive made? the no-ip thing is running, says everything is fine. but when i got to canyouseeme.org, it says it cant see through my ports or whatever, the connection was refused. whats going on? what did i do wrong? All help appreciated.

item.title: Whats going on?
item.dc:creator: @Sidewindscape Sidewindscape
item.description:
@Sidewindscape wrote:

Ok with server not running it couldnt see my service reason: connection timed out, and with the server running i get the same thing but reason: connection refused.

Read full topic

item.title: Whats going on?
item.dc:creator: @demonlover14 demonlover14
item.description:
@demonlover14 wrote:

[quote=“mod cody, post:2, topic:352525”]Ok you mush have port forwarded wrong

try doing canyouseeme.org:43594

with the run server running and it not running

tell me what u get each time[/quote]
You do know, usally only the owner host of the server can’t log in with the right IP.

Read full topic

item.title: Whats going on?
item.dc:creator: @Sidewindscape Sidewindscape
item.description:
@Sidewindscape wrote:

hey everyone,
kk ive got the source and a client, everything works fine when i log in with the ip 127.0.0.1 but i want to be able to log in with the ip that i made in the no-ip thing which is crisispkz.no-ip.org. ive made that ip and everything, thats all good. ive done the portforwarding, and ive allowed the port thing through my firewall and everything. but i still cant log on with the ip that ive made? the no-ip thing is running, says everything is fine. but when i got to canyouseeme.org, it says it cant see through my ports or whatever, the connection was refused. whats going on? what did i do wrong?
All help appreciated.

Read full topic
